org.eclipse.scada.vi.model

Interface Text

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Figure, Primitive
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextImpl

    public interface Text
extends Figure
    A representation of the model object 'Text'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Text
    • Label Alignment
    • Icon Alignment
    • Text Alignment
    • Text Placement
    • Font Name
    • Font Size
    • Font Bold
    • Font Italic

    See Also:
    VisualInterfacePackage.getText()
